title: SQL ServerREPLICATE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerREPLICATE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Repeat a string:
SELECT REPLICATE('SQL Tutorial', 5);

Definition and Usage
The REPLICATE() function repeats a string a specified number of times.
Syntax
REPLICATE(
string, integer
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to repeat
integer
Required. The number of times to repeat the string
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse
More Examples
Example
Repeat the text in CustomerName two times:
SELECT REPLICATE(CustomerName, 2)
FROM Customers;

❯
★
+1
